import React, { useState } from "react"; import "./topbar.css" import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import styled, { ThemeProvider } from "styled-components"; import { lightTheme, darkTheme, GlobalStyles } from "../themes.js"; const StyledApp = styled.div` color: ${(props) => props.theme.fontColor}; `; export default function TopBar () { const [theme, setTheme] = useState("light"); const themeToggler = () => { theme === "light" ? setTheme("dark") : setTheme("light"); } return (
  • HOME

    • themeToggler()} className="darkModeIcon fa-solid fa-moon">
    ); };
